entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
